    • Method Detail

      • calculateDistance

        public static double calculateDistance​(Intersection i1,
                                       Intersection i2)
        Calculates the geographical distance between two intersections using their coordinates. This method uses a simplified Euclidean distance calculation.
        Parameters:
        i1 - The first intersection.
        i2 - The second intersection.
        Returns:
        The Euclidean distance between the two intersections.

      • isValidPoint

        public static boolean isValidPoint​(Long point,
                                   HashMap<Long,​Boolean> visited,
                                   HashMap<String,​DeliveryRequest> requests)
        Checks if a point can be visited based on the delivery and pickup points. The point can only be visited if the corresponding pickup point has already been visited.
        Parameters:
        point - The point to check.
        visited - A map of visited points, where the key is the point and the value is whether it's been visited.
        requests - A map of delivery requests, where the key is the point ID and the value is the request.
        Returns:
        true if the point can be visited, false otherwise.

      • calculateSegmentDistance

        public static double calculateSegmentDistance​(List<Long> segmentPath,
                                              Map map)
        Calculates the total distance of a path by summing the lengths of each segment between intersections.
        Parameters:
        segmentPath - A list of intersection IDs representing the path.
        map - The map containing the intersections and their connections.
        Returns:
        The total distance of the path in the specified map.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If no segment exists between two consecutive intersections in the path.

      • calculateTravelTime

        public static Duration calculateTravelTime​(double distance)
        Calculates the travel time for a given distance based on the courier's speed. The time is calculated using the formula: time = distance / speed. The courier's speed is assumed to be constant at 15 km/h.
        Parameters:
        distance - The distance to be traveled in kilometers.
        Returns:
        A Duration object representing the time taken to travel the given distance.

      • sortRequestsByProximityToWarehouse

        public List<DeliveryRequest> sortRequestsByProximityToWarehouse​(Map map,
                                                                TourRequest tourRequest)
        Sorts the delivery requests based on their proximity to the warehouse. The requests are sorted by the distance between the pickup point and the warehouse.
        Parameters:
        map - The map containing all intersections and their connections.
        tourRequest - The tour request containing the delivery requests.
        Returns:
        A sorted list of DeliveryRequest objects, ordered by proximity to the warehouse.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If an intersection is not found in the map.

      • findClosestPoint

        public static Long findClosestPoint​(Long currentPoint,
                                    List<Long> candidates,
                                    Map map,
                                    HashMap<Long,​Boolean> visited,
                                    HashMap<String,​DeliveryRequest> requests)
        Finds the closest point to a given current point from a list of candidate points, while respecting the constraint that a pickup must occur before delivery.
        Parameters:
        currentPoint - The ID of the current point from which the closest point is to be found.
        candidates - A list of candidate points to check for proximity.
        map - The map containing all intersections.
        visited - A map of visited points, where the key is the point and the value is whether it has been visited.
        requests - A map of delivery requests containing pickup and delivery points.
        Returns:
        The ID of the closest valid point from the list of candidates.

      • findClosestPoint

        public static Long findClosestPoint​(Long currentPoint,
                                    List<Long> candidates,
                                    Map map,
                                    HashMap<Long,​Boolean> visited,
                                    HashMap<String,​DeliveryRequest> requests,
                                    HashMap<javafx.util.Pair<Long,​Long>,​List<Long>> shortestPaths)

      • scheduleOptimizedDeliveryRequests

        public static List<Long> scheduleOptimizedDeliveryRequests​(TourRequest tourRequest,
                                                           Map map)
        Fonction pour ordonnancer les requêtes de livraison d'un point de vue géographique.
        Parameters:
        tourRequest - L'objet TourRequest contenant les requêtes de livraison et les informations sur l'entrepôt.
        map - L'objet Map représentant la carte avec les intersections et les adjacences.
        Returns:
        Liste ordonnée des points à visiter (pickup et delivery), incluant le warehouse au début et à la fin.

      • scheduleOptimizedDeliveryRequests

        public static List<Long> scheduleOptimizedDeliveryRequests​(TourRequest tourRequest,
                                                           Map map,
                                                           HashMap<javafx.util.Pair<Long,​Long>,​List<Long>> shortestPaths)

      • filterMapByZone

        public static Map filterMapByZone​(Map originalMap,
                                  Intersection center,
                                  double radius)
        Fonction pour filtrer une carte afin de ne conserver que les intersections dans un rayon donné d'un point central.
        Parameters:
        originalMap - La carte d'origine avec toutes les intersections et adjacences.
        center - L'intersection centrale à partir de laquelle filtrer.
        radius - Le rayon dans lequel inclure les intersections.
        Returns:
        Une nouvelle carte contenant uniquement les intersections dans le rayon spécifié et leurs adjacences.

      • computeShortestPathsFromSourceWithPaths

        public static HashMap<Long,​PathResult> computeShortestPathsFromSourceWithPaths​(Long sourceId,
                                                                                     Map map)
        Computes the shortest paths from a given source intersection to all other intersections in the map using a modified Dijkstra algorithm, which includes the full path for each destination.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The ID of the source intersection.
        map - The map object containing intersections and adjacencies.
        Returns:
        A HashMap containing the shortest path results for each intersection, where the key is the intersection ID and the value is a PathResult object that contains the distance and the path leading to that intersection.

      • computeAllShortestPathsWithPaths

        public static HashMap<javafx.util.Pair<Long,​Long>,​List<Long>> computeAllShortestPathsWithPaths​(Map map)
        Computes the shortest paths between all pairs of intersections in the map, using the modified Dijkstra algorithm to include the full paths for each pair.
        Parameters:
        map - The map object containing intersections and adjacencies.
        Returns:
        A HashMap containing the shortest paths between each pair of intersections. The key is a Pair of intersection IDs, and the value is a List of Longs representing the path between the two intersections.

      • constructTourWithGeographicZones

        public static Tour constructTourWithGeographicZones​(List<Long> orderedPoints,
                                                    Map map)
        Constructs a tour based on the provided ordered list of intersection IDs, considering geographic zones and computing the shortest path between each successive pair of points. This method filters the map to focus on relevant intersections and calculates travel time based on the distance between points.
        Parameters:
        orderedPoints - A list of intersection IDs representing the ordered points of the tour.
        map - The map object containing intersections and adjacencies.
        Returns:
        A Tour object that contains the full path of intersections and the total travel duration.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If any intersection is missing or unreachable.

      • constructTourWithSpecificShortestPaths

        public static Tour constructTourWithSpecificShortestPaths​(List<Long> orderedPoints,
                                                          Map map)
        Constructs a tour based on the provided ordered list of intersection IDs, considering specific shortest paths between each successive pair of points. This method computes the shortest path for each pair on-demand and accumulates the total travel time.
        Parameters:
        orderedPoints - A list of intersection IDs representing the ordered points of the tour.
        map - The map object containing intersections and adjacencies.
        Returns:
        A Tour object that contains the full path of intersections and the total travel duration.

      • constructTourWithAllShortestPaths

        public static Tour constructTourWithAllShortestPaths​(List<Long> orderedPoints,
                                                     Map map,
                                                     HashMap<javafx.util.Pair<Long,​Long>,​List<Long>> shortestPaths)
        Constructs a tour using precomputed shortest paths between intersections. This method uses a list of ordered points and a map containing precomputed shortest paths between pairs of intersections. It calculates the total duration of the tour and constructs a list of intersections representing the tour's path.
        Parameters:
        orderedPoints - A list of ordered intersection IDs representing the order in which intersections are visited in the tour. The list must contain valid intersection IDs that exist in the map.
        map - A map containing all intersections and their adjacencies. Used to retrieve intersections and calculate distances.
        shortestPaths - A map containing the precomputed shortest paths between pairs of intersections. The map key is a pair of intersection IDs, and the value is a list of intersection IDs representing the shortest path between them.
        Returns:
        A Tour object representing the completed tour with all intersections and the total travel duration. The duration is calculated based on the distances of the segments defined in the shortestPaths map.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If any of the required intersections are not found in the map or if the shortest path data is missing.
